de.engehausen.treemap.examples.swt

Class FileViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.engehausen.treemap.examples.swt.FileViewer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILabelProvider<FileInfo>, ISelectionChangeListener<FileInfo>, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class FileViewer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, ISelectionChangeListener<FileInfo>, ILabelProvider<FileInfo>, java.io.Serializable
    Sample application using a tree map to show file sizes starting at a given directory.
    See Also:
